name: Specter X-Terminators
description:
Do you deal with constant hauntings?  Are specters causing you a hassle?  Then you should call the Specter X-Terminators!  Terminate pesky poltergeists in this Undertale-inspired RPG ode to classic 80s horror clichés!  And don't forget to vote for the Game Off 2022!

Controls:

Z -  select

X - Back

F - Fullscreen Toggle

Credits:

Programming, Artwork, & Sound - KBLM Studio

   Music made with Beepbox & Jummbox

   Sound effects made with JFXR

   Sprites made with Piskel

   Game Made with Gamemaker Studio 2

Compatible with Windows OS

SourceCode and Asset can be found at:

   https://github.com/KBLMStudio/SpecterX_Sourcecode_Assets
